text: John Raymond Smeaton (29 July 1914 – February 1984) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1984 deaths Category:People from Perth, Scotland Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Scone Thistle F.C. players Category:St Johnstone F.C. players Category:Blackburn Rovers F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Jeanfield Swifts F.C. players Category:Albion Rovers F.C. players Category:East Fife F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Jock Smeaton
